trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSC012_00949_SEQ_00<tab>Ourdilic is seeking aid for a rescue attempt.

TEXT_GAIUSC012_00949_SEQ_01<tab>One of the researchers at Snowcloak has not yet returned from collecting ice samples, and he has a reputation for attracting ice sprites. Ourdilic bids you find the hapless man, and if necessary, rescue him from attackers.

TEXT_GAIUSC012_00949_SEQ_02<tab>Ourdilic proves to be impressively correct in her surmise, for you come across the whey-faced researcher cringing from the ice sprite. Now that you have slain the sprite and extricated yourself from the researcher's fawning attentions, you must make your report to Ourdilic.

TEXT_GAIUSC012_00949_SEQ_03<tab>Ourdilic has a spot of good news for you as well; she has nipped in the bud the researcher's hopes for a <var 08 E905 ((romance)) ((bromance)) /var>. A happy ending for everyone─except the ice sprite, of course.
TEXT_GAIUSC012_00949_OURDILIC_000_000<tab>Never has the course of research run smooth at Snowcloak. We are bedeviled by ice sprites, for one.
TEXT_GAIUSC012_00949_OURDILIC_000_001<tab>I suspect the sprites are to blame for our latest problem─a researcher on a sample-drilling duty is late returning to camp.
TEXT_GAIUSC012_00949_OURDILIC_000_002<tab>The sprites delight in tormenting some more than others, and, well, he's just one of those fellows. Will you rush to his rescue?

TEXT_GAIUSC012_00949_NPCA_000_010<tab>You <var 1A 02 /var>saved<var 1A 01 /var> me! <var 08 E905 ((I think I'm in love with you!)) ((You're my best friend!)) /var> Let us return to the camp together─oh, you have something dangerous to do first? Um, all right. I'll just...see you later!

TEXT_GAIUSC012_00949_OURDILIC_000_030<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I just spoke with that whey-face. I made certain he understands you are a busy <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>, also.

TEXT_GAIUSC012_00949_OURDILIC_000_031<tab>Thanks to you, we too can busy ourselves with our mission! There will still be much hardship, but with your help, we <var 1A 02 /var>shall<var 1A 01 /var> find a way through the ice wall!
TEXT_GAIUSC012_00949_POP_MESSAGE_000<tab>You sense a sudden chill in the air!
